Articles.Content:
I tried to launch KSP, but it kept crashing on the loading screen. It can't be my RAM because I have 24 Gigabytes of it and I also have Active Texture Management. Here is my output_log.txt. (I am playing on 1.3)

[snip]

Edited January 30, 2019 by Vanamonde

Hello and welcome to the forum.   I'm one of the moderators here, and I'm sorry to tell you that we had to remove the log from your post. Very large posts like that cause page loading problems on the forum. Please upload the file to a hosting site and use the link they provide in your posts here.

8 hours ago, Mr.Capitalism said:

I also have Active Texture Management (I am playing on 1.3)

Considering that the last version of Active Texture Management has been released for 1.0 (and has been useless ever since the game changed the way textures are compressed) I would simply assume you have a ton of mods that are incompatible with the version of the game you're playing.
